item.description:
Dear Ensemble,

During this rehearsal, Jason will continue to amp up performers' character range, improv impulses, and teamwork skills through a progression on the high energy drills from last week. In addition, the Ensemble will work to sharpen its repertoire of games and address any sticking points that concern them. Please remind yourself of the fundamental principles of stage etiquette: (i) face the audience (ii) project your voice (iii) don't talk over each other.

Don't be fooled by my absence. I will be there in spirit:)

A bientot,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Ensemble A Rehearsal
